data.message: This is AWESOME Facebook!!!!! I am sure those with visual impairments will be so excited for such great technology!!!!

replies.message: Thanks for stopping by, Christina. We hope this will help our community! -Rey
This is Great.

Awesome tools for the impaired people, at least they won't be left behind of what was going on, to this country, and in around the globe, and best of all they will be in contact with their friends and love ones. Thanks Face Book you are all great people!!!
Wow this is very intelligent Facebook we need more social sites like you 🔹🔹🔹🔹
Magnifico como todo lo que tiene FB !!!
Nice!! How does it work? How do we activate this?
Thank you I have maculer degeneration I can see now but in the future if my eyes get worse this is good to know
Gracias facebook por esta nueva herramienta para los inpedidos de la vista God bless you all algun dia me tocarra ami usarla gracias y nuevamente Dios los vendiga y sigan hacia adelante amen
Facebook i need help with regular facebook cell phone texts
I can't help wondering how Facebook/alt text will explain SOME photos.
What about all the explicit content?

Jenny Gililland I am sure it won't be perfect but I am equally sure that if you were visually impaired  (I am not I am the legal guardian of someone who is but they do not use social media) anything would be better than nothing
Peaktra Sun I guess I am not understanding what you are asking?
This is brilliant

Thank you FaceBook this is awesome news!! My 23 year old daughter just had a stroke 3 weeks ago and it took her eyesight. This is awesome since she is going through Law School. Thank you, Thank you Teresa Beisel😊
Bravo Facebook!! What a great way to include everyone...very well done!

Christina Benton Jenny and Peaktra, I believe,  were inferring to "dirty" photos.  How would this new feature handle rated R or X content (that doesn't belong on facebook in the first place, but it's there).
Genial FB.
Facebook k aplicacion ai k bajar me iteresa
It is now I will at least know what my friends in church post when they are talking about events of the church or any other fun things
AWESOME
This is GREAT! Now all we need is the ability to completely delete a FB Page and start over when hacked. All we can do now is deactivate
How do I get this !
Facebook thank you for leading the way yet again! I have many friends than will benefit from this technology, one who I tagged is a big fb fan!
Muy  bien un logro más importante es
